metadata.title: CVE-2024-56696 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: core: Fix possible NULL dereference caused by kunit_kzalloc()kunit_kzalloc() may return a NULL pointer, dereferencing it withoutNULL check may lead to NULL dereference.Add NULL checks for all the kunit_kzalloc() in sound_kunit.c

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
